about_the_game:
The contents of this DLC are as follows:

----------------------------------------------
[Category : QoL2 in Epic Store]
- Bulk Spirit Allocation (500 EC)
- Bulk Purchase (500 EC)
- Minimum Stock Craft (500 EC)
- Spirit Save (500 EC)

[Category : Ticket in Epic Store]
- Ticket [Super Ascension] (2500 EC)

[Category : Other]
- Red Ball + 1
------------------------------ Equivalent to a total of 4500 EC

Spirit and Craft are very important factors to progress this game. We have carefully selected useful QoL related to these factors and packed them into this DLC! We promise that you will be able to play comfortably with this!


Note:
- In the Epic Store, you can purchase premium items and useful QoL with the in-game currency Epic Coin (EC).
- If you already purchased the QoL in this DLC, the Epic Coin for that QoL will be returned.
ex.) If you already purchased "Bulk Spirit Allocation" in QoL2 of Epic Store before, and purchased this DLC, then you will gain its contents except for "Bulk Spirit Allocation", and also additionally 500 Epic Coin.
- The number of red balls increase from the beginning of the game. In addition, the effect of Nitro is applied.
- Ticket is single-use item.
- It stacks with other DLC.
